message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great value and I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $85.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82.50. Would you be willing to consider that price?
I understand your offer, Bob, and I'm willing to compromise further. I can sell the product to you for $84. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $81?
I understand your offer, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can sell the product to you for $83. I think this is the best price I can offer, considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still trying to get the best deal I can. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $80.50?
